About Me

Let me tell you a little about me and my work

after my studies of electrical and information engineering at Leibniz University Hannover, i realized that i have a great interest in web development, so i started to improve my knowledge in this field. after more than one year i am able to develop the responsive website with the sophisticated features easily. You can find some of them in this portfolio under the title Work.
